title: Why is my account has been permanently suspended?? :(
body: I gave you an e-mail  many times but  riot games never gave me any response. :( I really wanna  know why because I think I will come back to America soon. I hope that you guys can give me a quick response. Thanks

replies.body:
It takes up to two days to get an answer from player support.
Sending another ticket or replying to the one already sent will send you back to the end of the line.

Just be patient and they will help you.
The end of the line doesn't happen on NA anymore! :)  It's okay to bump NA tickets, but no creating duplicates please!

Really?!  That's great news for a lot of people.  I'll correct my wording from now on.

Is there anywhere where this info gets updated that I can creep on so I don't give bad info?

I generally pick up my information from the poro's responses, and use them in my responses when they're not here to hopefully help people. I don't keep a word file full of things to copy and paste, as I believe everyone I respond to at least deserves to have their post read, and have their message hand written at the moment. Many of the posts here are the same things that come up frequently, so many of the potential solutions may seem a bit repeated here and there. It's quite interesting when something I've never seen before appears. Even if you give out slightly inaccurate information, you learn something new when you get corrected! You also often give them a chance to troubleshoot their issues before the poros arrive, and this gives them a better idea of what the issue may be, or even help them solve their issue sooner than expected.

Ah, that's not what I meant Kokua, but thank you.

The last ticket I made in October still mentioned that bumping the ticket would increase wait times, but the information above seems to change that.

I am hoping they updated the first response Zenbot sends to people accordingly.
And that they added that bit about not making duplicates.

Was more asking about _when_ the change occurred.
----------------------
I noticed a while ago (many months) that you were helping to hold the fort with them, so I shifted over to Player Behaviour from here.

There are the Wardens and Mods who hang around of course, but after discussions we ultimately end up sending people to Player Support since they are the ones who actually have the power to address the issue.

You'll be seeing me a bit now since it seems some PB threads are being made here.

Hey, it looks like we noticed so suspicious activity on your account so we locked it as a protective measure.  Reach out to our account team in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and they'll help get it safely back in your hands.
You should [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you haven't done so already. They won't put your personal information out here in the public.
